guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"ejo1e","text":"1. Don't place any vials containing SDS into an ice tray as the SDS will precipitate ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h3hd","text":"2. Use a laminar flow hood while working with any cultures in autoclaved reagents or cultures","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7i5v","text":"3. Don't vortex any tubes  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mgg3","text":"4. Dab with a paper towel before putting any new sample on NanoDrop ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajlf","text":"5. Look for a peak at 260 nm, and 260/280 and 260/230 ratios over ~1.8 to confirm a pure gDNA extract","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58p7i","text":"6. NanoDrop may provide an overestimate of DNA concentration (due to the presence of other contaminants like RNA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"1e77u","text":"1. Cell Pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"798fv","text":"2. MilliQ Water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qoip","text":"3. SDS (10%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7511","text":"4. Proteinase K (20 mg/mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5stuu","text":"5. RNase A (10 mg/mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acd3g","text":"6. Phenol-Chloroform (1:1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5vii","text":"7. Isopropanol (100%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u21m","text":"8. Chilled 70% Ethanol ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33hhf","text":"9. Sodium Acetate (3M, pH=5.2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi5fu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"664tb","text":"Phenol-Chloroform mixture contains some amount of Isoamyl Alcohol which allows the phase separation to appear distinct","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Using NanoDrop Spectrophotometer to measure gDNA concentration
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5sbrk","text":"Load   of autoclaved MilliQ water as blank on NanoDrop and load   of gDNA suspension as the sample to measure its concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5pjr5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50jco","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rt77","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"219ABBA02F8411EC9C68FBC788A56215","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"24436D702F8411EC9C68FBC788A56215","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
